abstractText: METHODS OF SENSING STAGE FOR AUTOMATIC RECORDINGStage is sensed for automatic recording by a float in a stilling well, or by a gas-purge system that transmits the pressure head of water in a stream to a manometer. The latter system, which does not require a stilling well, is known as a bubble gage.
title: Measurement of a Stage: Recording Stream-Gaging Stations v1.0
